caption.p: Plcg2 and Trem2 transcripts co-localize in the mouse brain. a Multiplex RNAScope for Plcg2 and Trem2 in the adult mouse cortex . Arrows point to co-expression, arrowheads indicate single-labeled cells. b Multiplex RNAScope for Plcg2 and Trem2 in the adult mouse hippocampal CA1 . Arrows point to co-expression, arrowheads indicate single-labeled cells. Note co-localization in processes of putative microglia
